page.title: 17Trade in the Alford area.
page.content: Most of Alford's shops, banks and businesses are outwith the survey area Within it are several builders, a butchers,a grocers,a drapers,a garden centre,an electricians,a TV engineers, kennels,a vets surgery and an egg grading station.Montgarrie Post Office and shop is open 8am-8:30pm 7 days a week.The hotel at Bridge of Alford is the local pub but is also used by salmon fishermen.One of Aberdeen- shire's last oatmeal mills is in Mont- garrie.Its oatmeal is famous and is sold all over the NE.The raw oat screenings are sold for animal feed. Gordon Rural Action Information Network is the equivalent of a citizen's advice bureau giving advice and information on many matters including consumer affairs.
